ygData.subject: RE: Diamond Dust
ygData.msgSnippet: The ogres are in the large green area off lake rathe to the left of the zone in from S karana.  They are indifferent to everyone.  I pray to Ro for you.
ygData.messageBody:
The ogres are in the large green area off lake rathe to the left of the zone
in from S karana. They are indifferent to everyone. I pray to Ro for you.

Leagnomo

-----Original Message-----
From: Brad Balatgek [mailto:gazamel@...]
Sent: Thursday, December 02, 1999 9:25 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Diamond Dust


From: Brad Balatgek <gazamel@...>

Well, I have 5 diamonds on me...I guess that I can
break down and get one crushed... Where exactly are
these ogres? And what kind of faction do I need to
talk to them?

Gazamel Prime
Master Tinker
Solusek Ro
